title: Panda North
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical Asian place and sushi bar but has a vegetarian section on the menu offering dishes with tofu and vegetables, including Chinese mix vegetables, tofu with broccoli, ma po tofu, and several others. Restaurant access is through a hallway past tourist shops. Atmosphere is very casual. Note the fried rice contains egg.
